content: उद्भवः {@--1@} Production, creation, birth, generation (<ab>lit.</ab> and <ab>fig.</ab>); इति हेतुस्तदुद्भवे <ls>K. P. 1</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 80</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> at the end of <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘springing or arising from,’ ‘produced from’; ऊरूद्भवा <ls>V. 1. 3</ls>; मणिराकरोद्भवः <ls>R. 3. 18.</ls> {@--2@} Source, origin; उद्भवो यशसः <ls>K. 54.</ls> {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu; उद्भवः क्षोभनो देवः <ls>V. Sah.</ls>
